about_the_game:
In the Coop Campaign of Black Powder Desolation you and up to 3 of your friends step into the roles of 4 Factory workers caugth in unfortunate circumstances, after a riot in the industry square ends up with the factory owner killed and 4 common workers suspected for the murder, forcing them to live their lives as outlaws on the run.
Fight alongside eachother while on the run, stealing from local towns, fighting gang feuds, robbing Banks and avoiding the Law.
The Story is being unfolded over the course of 12 Levels containing a wide Range of distinct locations, like different smalltowns, woodlands, industrial areas, citys and much more, featuring challenging different gameplay scenarios that promote teamplay and cooperation along the way.



Fight against a variety of different Enemy types in a variety of weapon, armor and special variants, like the Armored-Enforcer, Shield Officer, Sheriff and more to experience unique and challenging gameplay situations were you have to come together as a team to most effectively fight against your enemies!



Unlock a wide variety of carefully crafted and realistically depicted weapons and becoming skilled at handling them all in accuracy and firing speed by mastering Black Powder Desolation`s manuall cycling System wich is unique to every gun and makes Gun play not only feel more immersive but directly ties firing speed to ones individual weapon mastery.

Upgrade your Campaign Classes using the easy to use Skillcard system wich you can use to choose up to 3 skills per Class to improve your characters playstyle to match your specific strengths and weaknesses and create more and more Character build possibilitys by unlocking all the specified character skillscards.

short_description: Fight your way past the law with up to 3 of your friends in a coop campaign containing a variety of distinct locations and gameplay rewarding teamplay and cooperation, or master a variety of weapon classes against other players in thrilling battles featuring up to 24 players.
